item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Search for if(spellID == 1592) { //entangle level 79 the end of it is there when the teleblock spellID starts. Replace your whole entangle spellID thingy with this if(spellID == 1592) { //entangle level 79 if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 79) { sendMessage("This player is currently immune to this spell."); startAnimation(0); meStill(); } if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 79) { sendMessage("This player is already being held by a magical force."); startAnimation(0); meStill(); } if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 79) { ProjectileSpellPlayer(177, 178, 179, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 79); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; meStill(); castOnPlayer.meStill(); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("A magical force stops you from moving!"); } if(playerLevel[6] <= 78) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 79 to cast this spell."); meStill(); startAnimation(0); } }
Note: Make a backup.

Read full topic
